author: The Hated One
description:
Mark Zuckerberg wouldn't download a car. He would just use it fairly.
Help me produce more content like this and access my podcast: https://www.patreon.com/thehatedone 

This is not a sensational clickbait headline. I genuinely believe that if we held Zucc to the same standards we are held to, he’d be jailed for life. And I think by the end of this video, and trust me you are going to want to watch all of it, you’ll be convinced of the veracity of my opinion. I will start from the most recent case, but this will get way worse very quickly. Like literal crimes against humanity levels of bad.

As you may know, Mark Zuckerberg was caught full red-handed in a major conspiracy to pirate copyrighted books and articles from illegal libraries. For those who don’t know, court documents filed by authors suing Meta reveal that Zucc’s company pirated 81.7 terabytes of data across multiple shadow libraries through Anna’s Archive. That’s on top of previously having pirated 80.6 terabytes from LibG
title: Mark Zuckerberg Should Be JAILED FOR LIFE!!!
